originalText.text: I would like to share our experience with STEM. We approached Rukmani for our elder Son Himmat for ISEE prep and private school admissions in Sept, 2023. There was very little time left in the admissions cycle to prepare for school admissions and the standardized test. Rukmani and her staff not only accommodated & adjusted the schedule for instruction but also worked tirelessly to get our Boy ready for testing in little over 8 weeks. Simply amazing as the results are outstanding. Himmat got selected in 5 out of 9 schools with 2 waitlists. I would unequivocally recommend with the highest conviction STEM to aspiring students, who want to get into top competitive private school in NYC. You have helped shape our child's middle school career. Grateful and thank you.

originalText.text:
Rukmini is the BEST of the BEST!! Her team is incredible. They are passionate, energetic, and engaging. All three of my boys landed in their top choices after working with Rukmini and her crew.
Horace Mann

originalText.text: We love NYC STEM! This is year 2 for us and my daughter is doing better in school, has more confidence and did really well on her state testing. The team is steady and thoughtful and gives an individualized approach.

text.text: We love NYC STEM! This is year 2 for us and my daughter is doing better in school, has more confidence and did really well on her state testing. The team is steady and thoughtful and gives an individualized approach.

originalText.text:
My wife and I would like to give a huge shout out to NYC Stem Club. The experts at NYC Stem Club helped my son master each step of the college essay writing process and learn to craft a memorable submission that stood the test of admission counselors.

Rukmini and Grace took the time to sit with my son and listen to what he wanted to write in his essay. Grace was grace personified as she gently nudged my son into penning his ideas, taking the time to go in-depth into each one and crafting that in his essay. The dedication in this process was mind blowing. He learned to conceptualize, refine and edit his essays to stand out amongst very noteworthy students applying for colleges. Both Rukmini and Grace are dedicated and know exactly what colleges want to see in an essay and they have the unique talent of bringing the best out of kids' essay.

With NYC Stem's guidance my son got accepted into all the 10 colleges that he applied to, and we are forever grateful to them.

originalText.text: We are big fans of the Stem Club team and program! Our 10 year old son has never been more motivated with math work - teachers make it fun and competitive in a healthy and caring way. Thank you all.
